title: The Kakeya problem
brief_description:
Features A.S. Besicovitch;
“SUMMARY: discusses the determination of the minimum area within which a line segment may be turned so that its direction is reversed, showing that no such minimum area exists and indicating a process whereby the rotation is performed within an arbitrarily small area”
